mapper.select:
select a.stcd as stcd,a.stnm as stnm,( select addvnm from st_addvcd_d where addvcd = a.addvcd ) as county,( select fsltdz from st_rsvrfsr_b where stcd = a.stcd and bgmd = ( select min(bgmd) as bgmd from st_rsvrfsr_b where stcd = a.stcd ) ) as ffsltdz,( select fsltdz from st_rsvrfsr_b where stcd = a.stcd and bgmd = ( select max(bgmd) as bgmd from st_rsvrfsr_b where stcd = a.stcd ) ) as bfsltdz,b.tm as tm,b.rz as rz,f.fsltdz as fsltdz,b.rz - f.fsltdz as cfsltdz,b.w as w,b.inq as inq,b.otq as otq,b.rwptn as rwptn,b.blrz as blrz from st_stbprp_b a left join ( select p.stcd,p.rz,p.rwptn,p.w,p.blrz,p.inq,p.otq,p.tm from ( select stcd,max(tm) as tm from st_rsvr_r where tm >= to_date(#{bgTm},'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') and tm < to_date(#{endTm},'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') group by stcd ) r left join st_rsvr_r p on r.stcd = p.stcd and r.tm = p.tm ) b on a.stcd = b.stcd left join ( select n.stcd,n.fsltdz from st_rsvrfsr_b n,( select stcd,max(bgmd) as bgmd from st_rsvrfsr_b where #{md} >= bgmd and edmd >= #{md} group by stcd ) rn where n.stcd = rn.stcd and n.bgmd = rn.bgmd and #{md} >= n.bgmd and n.edmd >= #{md} union select p.stcd,p.fsltdz from st_rsvrfsr_b p,( select m.stcd,max(m.bgmd) as bgmd from st_rsvrfsr_b m where m.stcd not in ( select n.stcd from st_rsvrfsr_b n where #{md} >= n.bgmd and n.edmd >= #{md} ) group by m.stcd ) q where p.stcd = q.stcd and p.bgmd = q.bgmd ) f on a.stcd = f.stcd
where a.stcd in #{item}
